src/capek.h

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001     template <class T, class D>
00002     void capek(const std::vector<T>& objects, D dmetric, size_t k, std::vector<T> *medoids = NULL) 
00003     {
00004       int size, rank;
00005       CMPI_Comm_size(comm, &size);
00006       CMPI_Comm_rank(comm, &rank);
00007 
00008       seed_random_uniform(comm); // seed RN generator uniformly across ranks.
00009 
00010       // fix things if k is greater than the number of elements, since we can't 
00011       // ever find that many clusters.
00012       size_t num_objects = size * objects.size();
00013       k = std::min(num_objects, k);
00014       timer.record("Init");
00015 
00016       // do parallel work: farms out trials and broadcasts medoids from each trial to
00017       // all processes.  On completion, medoids from all trials are in all_medoids vector.
00018       std::vector<typename id_pair<T>::vector> all_medoids(max_reps);
00019       trial_generator trials(k, k, max_reps, init_size, num_objects);
00020       run_pam_trials(trials, objects, dmetric, all_medoids, comm);
00021 
00022       // Make two arrays to hold our closest medoids and their distance from our object
00023       std::vector<double> all_dissimilarities(trials.count(), 0.0);           // dissimilarity sums
00024       std::vector< std::vector<medoid_id> > all_cluster_ids(trials.count());  // local nearest medoid ids
00025 
00026       // Go through all the trials again, and for each of them, find the closest 
00027       // medoid to this process's objects and sum the dissimilarities
00028       for (size_t i=0; i < trials.count(); i++) {
00029         for (size_t o=0; o < objects.size(); o++) {
00030           object_id global_oid = rank + o;
00031           std::pair<double, size_t> closest = closest_medoid(objects[o], global_oid, all_medoids[i], dmetric);
00032 
00033           all_dissimilarities[i]  += closest.first;
00034           all_cluster_ids[i].push_back(closest.second);
00035         }
00036       }
00037       timer.record("FindMinima");
00038 
00039       // Sum up all the min dissimilarities.  We do a Reduce/Bcast instead of an Allreduce
00040       // to avoid FP error and guarantee that sums is the same across all processors.
00041       std::vector<double> sums(trials.count());         // destination vectors for reduction.
00042 
00043       CMPI_Reduce(&all_dissimilarities[0],  &sums[0], trials.count(), MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, 0, comm);
00044       CMPI_Bcast(&sums[0],  trials.count(), MPI_DOUBLE, 0, comm);
00045       timer.record("GlobalSums");
00046 
00047       // find minmum global dissimilarity among all trials.
00048       std::vector<double>::iterator min_sum = std::min_element(sums.begin(), sums.end());
00049       total_dissimilarity = *min_sum;
00050       size_t best = (min_sum - sums.begin());  // index of best trial.
00051 
00052 
00053       // Finally set up the partition to correspond to trial with best dissimilarity found
00054       medoid_ids.resize(all_medoids[best].size());
00055       for (size_t i = 0; i < medoid_ids.size(); i++) {
00056         medoid_ids[i] = all_medoids[best][i].id;
00057       }
00058 
00059       // Make an indirection vector from the unsorted to sorted medoids
00060       std::vector<size_t> mapping(medoid_ids.size());
00061       std::generate(mapping.begin(), mapping.end(), sequence());
00062       std::sort(mapping.begin(), mapping.end(), indexed_lt(medoid_ids));
00063       invert(mapping);
00064 
00065       // set up local cluster ids, medoids, and medoid_ids with the sorted mapping.
00066       for (size_t i=0; i < medoid_ids.size(); i++) {
00067         medoid_ids[i] = all_medoids[best][mapping[i]].id;
00068       }
00069 
00070       // swap in the cluster ids with the best BIC score.
00071       cluster_ids.swap(all_cluster_ids[best]);
00072 
00073       // if the caller wanted a copy of the medoids, copy them into the dstination array.
00074       if (medoids) {
00075         medoids->resize(medoid_ids.size());
00076         for (size_t i=0; i < medoid_ids.size(); i++) {
00077           (*medoids)[i] = all_medoids[best][mapping[i]].element;
00078         }
00079       }
00080 
00081       timer.record("BicScore");
00082     }
